CASE CONSULTATION

800-604-0466

Upload Letter

Consumer Attorneys LLP litigates class-actions and individual actions against debt collectors under the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act (“FDCPA”). It is quite common for debt collectors to violate the FDCPA by including false, misleading, harassing or confusing language in collection letters. If you received a collection letter or any other written communication from a debt collector, please fill out the entire form below and upload the collection letter or other communication using the link provided. An attorney will review the communication and contact you to discuss next steps in the event further action can be taken.

By submitting you agree to our Terms & Privacy Policy
